ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrated writer Darcie Little Badger (A Snake Falls to Earth, Marvel's Voices: Indigenous Voices) pens the latest shapeshifter story!
Experience the moving tale of a Lipan Apache girl named Rose through four pivotal stages in her life: from a lonely child, to a ballet prodigy, her struggles as an adult, and finally her time as an older woman. This touching and lyrical love letter to family, heritage, and finding your true self is sure to delight readers of all ages.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-02-10 11:48:43. [CVDB915371]
